articles.author: Sebastian Kettley
articles.title: End of the world: Astronomers name solar threat that will turn Earth into 'lifeless rock' - Daily Express
articles.description: THE end of the world will come at the hands of our dying Sun, which astronomers have announced will one day expand into a so-called red giant and boil the Earth alive, rendering the planet a 'lifeless rock'.
